title: China set to launch first Guowang megaconstellation satellites on Long March 5B
summary:
HELSINKI — China appears set to launch the first satellites for a long-expected national low Earth orbit megaconstellation after rollout of a Long March 5B rocket at Wenchang spaceport. Images […]
The post China set to launch first Guowang megaconstellation satellites on Long March 5B appeared first on SpaceNews.
